caption.title: Acclimatization of physiological traits in the global hotspot of salamander diversity.
caption.p:
The species richness of the salamander diversity hotspot (
60 ) inset on top of the eastern United States with the geographic range of the P. jordani species complex outlined in black ( A). Mean values with SDs of environmental and physiological measurements (adjusted for mass) showing that high VPDs ( B) coincide with r i ( C), and high temperatures ( D) were associated with low volume of oxygen consumption ( E) across the seasonal time points.
